warmup-crypto.name: Warmup Crypto
warmup-crypto.description: Apply the Caesar tool with shift 13 to decode the provided ciphertext.
warmup-crypto.notes: Remember to document the decoded plaintext and the steps taken.

pcap-inspection.name: PCAP Inspection
pcap-inspection.description: Use tshark or the built-in tools to enumerate credentials in the capture.
pcap-inspection.notes: Look for HTTP basic auth and DNS exfiltration patterns.
